# Environment = mssparkutils.env.getWorkspaceName()
# if 'prod' in Environment:
#     StorageAccount = 'citylogisticsstorageprod'
#     StorageAccountRead = 'citylogisticsstorageprod'
#     StorageAccountRead2 = 'citylogisticsstorageprod'
#     StorageAccountWrite = 'citylogisticsstorageprod'
# else:
#     StorageAccount = 'citylogisticsstorage'
#     StorageAccountRead = 'citylogisticsstorageprod'
#     StorageAccountRead2 = 'citylogisticsstorage'
#     StorageAccountWrite = 'citylogisticsstorage'

# # ' + StorageAccount + '

# #Create DataFrame for the prpclockinghoursdetail CLMasterData Table
# prpclockinghoursdetail = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/CLMasterData/prpclockinghoursdetail.parquet', format='parquet')
# prpclockinghoursdetail.createOrReplaceTempView("prpclockinghoursdetail")

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stprpclockinghoursdetail
AS
SELECT 
    id as prp_clockinghoursdetail_id
    ,division as prp_clockinghoursdetail_division
    ,costcentredescription as prp_clockinghoursdetail_costcentredescription
    ,costcentrecode as prp_clockinghoursdetail_costcentrecode
    ,teamname as prp_clockinghoursdetail_teamname
    ,payroll as prp_clockinghoursdetail_payroll
    ,employee as prp_clockinghoursdetail_employee
    ,assignment as prp_clockinghoursdetail_assignment
    ,employeenumber as prp_clockinghoursdetail_employeenumber
    ,vendorempnumber as prp_clockinghoursdetail_vendorempnumber
    ,vendor as prp_clockinghoursdetail_vendor
    ,jobcategory as prp_clockinghoursdetail_jobcategory
    ,rate as prp_clockinghoursdetail_rate
    ,to_date(date, 'dd MMM yyyy')  as prp_clockinghoursdetail_date
    ,weekofyear(to_date(date, 'dd MMM yyyy'))-12  as prp_clockinghoursdetail_week
    ,shift as prp_clockinghoursdetail_shift
    ,shifttime as prp_clockinghoursdetail_shifttime
    ,calctime as prp_clockinghoursdetail_calctime
    ,clockin as prp_clockinghoursdetail_clockin
    ,clockout as prp_clockinghoursdetail_clockout
    ,approvalstatus as prp_clockinghoursdetail_approvalstatus
    ,totinvval as prp_clockinghoursdetail_totinvval
    ,finalflag as prp_clockinghoursdetail_finalflag
FROM prpclockinghoursdetail

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stprpclockinghoursdaily
AS
SELECT 
     division as prp_clockinghoursdaily_division
    ,costcentredescription as prp_clockinghoursdaily_costcentredescription
    ,costcentrecode as prp_clockinghoursdaily_costcentrecode
    ,teamname as prp_clockinghoursdaily_teamname
    ,payroll as prp_clockinghoursdaily_payroll
    ,vendor as prp_clockinghoursdaily_vendor
    ,jobcategory as prp_clockinghoursdaily_jobcategory
    ,to_date(date, 'dd MMM yyyy')  as prp_clockinghoursdaily_date
    ,weekofyear(to_date(date, 'dd MMM yyyy'))-12  as prp_clockinghoursdaily_week
    ,approvalstatus as prp_clockinghoursdaily_approvalstatus
    ,sum(totinvval) as prp_clockinghoursdaily_totinvval
    ,finalflag as prp_clockinghoursdaily_finalflag
FROM prpclockinghoursdetail
GROUP BY
     division
    ,costcentredescription
    ,costcentrecode
    ,teamname
    ,payroll
    ,vendor
    ,jobcategory
    ,to_date(date, 'dd MMM yyyy')
    ,weekofyear(to_date(date, 'dd MMM yyyy'))-12
    ,approvalstatus
    ,finalflag
